str2: But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.
From a primary ergo; toil; by implication, an act.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Neuter Singular
Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: It becomes, is fitting to, is right. Apparently a primary verb; to tower up, i.e. to be suitable or proper.
A woman, wife, my lady. Probably from the base of ginomai; a woman; specially, a wife.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Dative Feminine Plural
str2: From epi and the base of aggelos; to announce upon, i.e. to engage to do something, to assert something respecting oneself.
Reverence for God, fear of God, godliness, piety. From theosebes; devoutness, i.e. Piety.
